titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an George Edward Moore, 22. 2. 1938
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Abschrift (Cambridge Letters, S. 288). Publiziert (Cambridge Letters, S. 288f.; WiC, S. 266).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: I should be very grateful if you would let me know the result of the Council meeting regarding my MSS. My address is
I wish you'ld see Skinner one of these days.
